resources.name: 01 - manual
resources.description:
### Realizar chamada em /oauth/token fornecendo os query parameters
- code: código gerado na reuisição `00 - manual`
- redirect_uri: http://127.0.0.1:8080/authorized
- grant_type: authorization_code


### Exemplo URL
http://localhost:8080/oauth2/token?client_id=client_auth&redirect_uri=http://127.0.0.1:8080/authorized&grant_type=authorization_code&code=codigo_gerado_em_00_manual

---

``` java
RegisteredClient
	.withId(UUID.randomUUID().toString())
	.clientId("client_auth")
	.clientSecret("{noop}secret_auth")
	.clientAuthenticationMethod(ClientAuthenticationMethod.CLIENT_SECRET_POST)
	.authorizationGrantType(AuthorizationGrantType.AUTHORIZATION_CODE)
	.authorizationGrantType(AuthorizationGrantType.REFRESH_TOKEN)
	.redirectUri("http://127.0.0.1:8080/authorized")
	.scope("read")
	//.clientSettings(ClientSettings.builder().requireAuthorizationConsent(true).build())
	.build();
```

resources.name: 00 - manual
resources.description:
### Chamar http://localhost:8080/oauth2/authorize com os query parameters
- response_type: code
- client_id: client_auth
- scope: read
- redirect_uri: http://127.0.0.1:8080/authorized
- [clique-aqui-url-pronta](http://127.0.0.1:8080/oauth2/authorize?response_type=code&client_id=client_auth&scope=read&redirect_uri=http://127.0.0.1:8080/authorized)

### Copiar o `code` gerado
- Copiar o parameter `code` retornado na URI da requisição acima
- exemplo: http://127.0.0.1:8080/authorized?code=`code`

### Seguir para a rquisição `01 - manual`

----

``` java
RegisteredClient
	.withId(UUID.randomUUID().toString())
	.clientId("client_auth")
	.clientSecret("{noop}secret_auth")
	.clientAuthenticationMethod(ClientAuthenticationMethod.CLIENT_SECRET_POST)
	.authorizationGrantType(AuthorizationGrantType.AUTHORIZATION_CODE)
	.authorizationGrantType(AuthorizationGrantType.REFRESH_TOKEN)
	.redirectUri("http://127.0.0.1:8080/authorized")
	.scope("read")
	//.clientSettings(ClientSettings.builder().requireAuthorizationConsent(true).build())
	.build();
```

resources.name: automatico
resources.description:
### Oauth2 automatico
As configurações do Oauth2 estão na aba Oauth da requisição. Essa requisição tem o mesmo resultado da execução das requisições `00 - manual` e `01 - manual` em uma "única" chamada.

``` java
RegisteredClient
	.withId(UUID.randomUUID().toString())
	.clientId("client_auth")
	.clientSecret("{noop}secret_auth")
	.clientAuthenticationMethod(ClientAuthenticationMethod.CLIENT_SECRET_POST)
	.authorizationGrantType(AuthorizationGrantType.AUTHORIZATION_CODE)
	.authorizationGrantType(AuthorizationGrantType.REFRESH_TOKEN)
	.redirectUri("http://127.0.0.1:8080/authorized")
	.scope("read")
	//.clientSettings(ClientSettings.builder().requireAuthorizationConsent(true).build())
	.build();
```
